mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ibkct_labor_contract_info(id, name, creater, createdDeptId, owner, ownerDeptId, createdTime, modifier, modifiedTime, workflowInstanceId, sequenceNo, sequenceStatus, ownerDeptQueryCode, business_unit, personnel_name, idnumber, employee_status, phone, email, employee_type, entry_time, education, graduated_school, graduated_time, major, domicile_place, current_address, contract_num, contract_end_time, contract_start_time, probation_end_time, probation_start_time, employment_forms, workhours_category, employee_position, employee_salary, probation_salary, resignation_time, resignation_reason, employee_files_id, first_level_client_name, second_level_client_name) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{creater}, #{createdDeptId}, #{owner}, #{ownerDeptId}, #{createdTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifiedTime}, #{workflowInstanceId}, #{sequenceNo}, #{sequenceStatus}, #{ownerDeptQueryCode}, #{businessUnit}, #{personnelName}, #{idnumber}, #{employeeStatus}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{employeeType}, #{entryTime}, #{education}, #{graduatedSchool}, #{graduatedTime}, #{major}, #{domicilePlace}, #{currentAddress}, #{contractNum}, #{contractEndTime}, #{contractStartTime}, #{probationEndTime}, #{probationStartTime}, #{employmentForms}, #{workhoursCategory}, #{employeePosition}, #{employeeSalary}, #{probationSalary}, #{resignationTime}, #{resignationReason}, #{employeeFilesId}, #{firstLevelClientName}, #{secondLevelClientName})
